item.title: CCSS Discord Code of Conduct
item.description: Discord Code of Conduct Our server follows the Discord Terms of Service and Guidelines. No illegal content is allowed. In addition, our rules are an extension of the CCSS Code of Conduct. ðŸ§ Avoid Sensitive Topics Discussions involving sensitive or polarizing topics (such as political or religious views) can quickly derail conversations, make others uncomfortable, and undermine the supportive environment we’re trying to maintain. To keep the focus on learning and collaboration, please avoid these subjects entirely.
